LanguageData.GG_ControllerStartDesc: A grey goo controller was detected in {0}. It will facilitate the spread of grey goo across the planet as long as it's active.
LanguageData.MSS_GreyGoo_GooSpreadScale: Scale the number of new tiles to spread to every LongTick [{0}]
LanguageData.MSS_GreyGoo_GooSpreadIncrement: Grey Goo spread speed increment - how much goo to apply to a tile each tick [{0}]
LanguageData.MSS_GG_GooControllerSpawned: A new grey goo controller has formed!
